messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Enigmatic Estate Escapade DATE: 07/07/62 The courtroom brimmed with a mixture of curiosity and apprehension as the trial progressed. The prosecution called upon the officers integral to the investigation to share their testimonies. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: PROSECUTOR: Please state your name and role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Captain A. B. Anderson, the primary investigator in this case. PROSECUTOR: Thank you, Captain Anderson. Could you recount the events on the night the escapade was discovered? WITNESS: Absolutely. On the night of January 1st, Officer C. D. Davis noticed the main gate of the estate open and reported it. We began the investigation forthwith. PROSECUTOR: Who was responsible for the forensic examination? WITNESS: Sergeant E. F. Evans and Technician G. H. Ford managed the forensic analysis. PROSECUTOR: Who conducted the interrogations? WITNESS: Detectives I. J. Graham and K. L. Hall handled the interrogations of suspects and potential witnesses. PROSECUTOR: Thank you. No further questions. The Defense initiated a cross-examination of Captain Anderson regarding the investigative methodology. During the trial, Patrol Officers M. N. Isaac, O. P. Johnson, and Q. R. Kelly were also brought to testify.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Captain A. B. Anderson 
Officer Context: Captain Anderson is the primary investigator in the Enigmatic Estate Escapade case, describing the events on the night the escapade was discovered during the trial. 
Officer Role: Captain 

Officer Name: Officer C. D. Davis 
Officer Context: Officer Davis observed the main gate of the estate open on the night of January 1st, which initiated the investigation. 
Officer Role: Officer 

Officer Name: Sergeant E. F. Evans 
Officer Context: Sergeant Evans, along with Technician G. H. Ford, was responsible for managing the forensic examination related to the case. 
Officer Role: Sergeant 

Officer Name: Technician G. H. Ford 
Officer Context: Technician Ford worked with Sergeant E. F. Evans on the forensic analysis concerning the escapade at the estate. 
Officer Role: Technician 

Officer Name: Detective I. J. Graham 
Officer Context: Detective Graham, alongside Detective K. L. Hall, conducted interrogations of suspects and potential witnesses to gather more information regarding the escapade. 
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective K. L. Hall 
Officer Context: Detective Hall, along with Detective I. J. Graham, was tasked with interrogating individuals to collect additional information about the incident. 
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Patrol Officers M. N. Isaac, O. P. Johnson, and Q. R. Kelly 
Officer Context: These Patrol Officers were called to testify during the trial, although their specific roles in the investigation were not detailed in the transcript. 
Officer Role: Patrol Officers
